title: Khione
subtitle: A modern AI experience for clarity and focus

sections.title: What is Khione?
sections.text: Khione is a high-quality AI assistant designed for clarity, creativity, and productivity â€” built to support you effectively in everyday tasks and idea development.

sections.title: Smart & efficient
sections.text: Khione combines fast responses with a clean, modern user interface for a smooth and enjoyable experience.

sections.title: Privacy first
sections.text: Your input is handled responsibly. Privacy and transparency are core principles of Khione.

sections.title: Subscription
sections.text: Khione offers optional subscriptions with extended features. A basic set of functionality is available for free. Subscriptions can be managed or canceled at any time in the iOS settings.
